title: Never & Forever
description: What happens when a strong heroine meets a broken hero? Ryan: I’ll destroy her and every glimmer of hope she represents, or I’ll cling to her for my life. All I need is a sign to know which direction to take. A sign to save me or annihilate us both. A way forward when all I see is her. Virginia: He can push, I’ll stand strong. But he might be my downfall, and I’ll never let him pull me down into his darkness. No matter the temptation.  An emotional, enemies-to-lovers romance that will guide you through love, hardship, and forgiveness.
author: Gabrielle G.
